name: .I7XP File Extension
summary: Learn about .I7XP files and view a list of programs that open them.

instructions: You can open an I7XP file with Inform by selecting File â†’ Open Project..., navigate to the location of the I7XP file, select it, then click Open.
Since the I7XP file is just a folder, you can open the file by double-clicking it in the Windows File Explorer. You can then view its contents, which includes the I7X file(s) in the "Source" folder.
